author: Rachel England
title: WhatsApp trials video calls with up to eight people
description: Video calling has taken on an important new focus in recent times, with the likes of Meet and Zoom seeing a surge in use as millions of people around the world stay at home. WhatsApp, which could previously only support up to four people on a video call, has …
